name: IP_EPISODE_LINK
description: The episode table for Inpatient episodes. This is used as a substitute for the EPISODE and EPISODE_LINK tables.

columns.name: EPISODE_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the episode of care record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: This identifies the encounter within the episode.

columns.name: SUM_BLK_TYPE_ID
columns.description: The category value associated with the type of the episode. The episode type determines what SmartForms and/or flowsheets are available for a particular episode in clinical system.

columns.name: PAT_ENC_CSN_ID
columns.description: A unique serial number for this encounter. This number is unique across all patients and encounters in the system.

columns.name: INP_CSN
columns.description: A unique serial number for this Inpatient Data (INP) record.

columns.name: INPATIENT_DATA_ID
columns.description: A unique ID assigned to the Inpatient Data (INP) record

columns.name: START_DATE
columns.description: The date the episode was initiated  in calendar format. This field is called Noted on the clinical system screen.

columns.name: END_DATE
columns.description: The date the episode was resolved in calendar format. This field is called Resolved on the clinical system screen.

columns.name: CARE_INTG_ID
columns.description: The unique ID for the inpatient care integrator record.

columns.name: STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description: The status of the episode record: i.e. Active, Resolved, or Deleted.
